mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as listNo, t.no as bestNo, t.name as fileName, t.con as content, t.title as title, t.category as category, t.hits from (select @rownum:=0 order by @rownum) tmp, (select v.L_NO as no, sum(v.v_HITS) as hits, v.I_REAL_FILE_NAME as name, l.L_CONTENT as con, l.L_TITLE as title, l.L_CATEGORY as category from tbl_video v, tbl_lecture l where v.L_NO = l.L_NO and l.L_CATEGORY = #{category} group by v.L_NO having min(S_NO) order by hits desc, no) as t limit 0, 16;

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as listNo, t.no as bestNo, t.name as fileName, t.con as content, t.title as title, t.category as category, t.hits from (select @rownum:=0 order by @rownum) tmp, (select v.L_NO as no, sum(v.v_HITS) as hits, v.I_REAL_FILE_NAME as name, l.L_CONTENT as con, l.L_TITLE as title, l.L_CATEGORY as category from tbl_video v, tbl_lecture l where v.L_NO = l.L_NO and l.L_CATEGORY = #{category} group by v.L_NO having min(S_NO) order by hits desc, no) as t limit #{no}, 8;

select v.L_NO as latestNo, l.l_reg_date as date, v.I_REAL_FILE_NAME as fileName, l.L_CONTENT as content, l.L_TITLE as title, l.L_CATEGORY from tbl_video v, tbl_lecture l where v.L_NO = l.L_NO and l.L_CATEGORY = #{category} group by v.L_NO having min(S_NO) order by date , latestNo limit 0, 16;

select v.L_NO as latestNo, l.l_reg_date as date, v.I_REAL_FILE_NAME as fileName, l.L_CONTENT as content, l.L_TITLE as title, l.L_CATEGORY from tbl_video v, tbl_lecture l where v.L_NO = l.L_NO and l.L_CATEGORY = #{category} group by v.L_NO having min(S_NO) order by date , latestNo limit #{no}, 8;
